response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, durability, and the time and effort put into its creation. Considering its immense value and benefits, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $10,500. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 10500}
